availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hugh Mitchell Sparkman (Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Sparkman. Father of Francis Sparkman, William G. Sparkman, Luallin Sparkman, Henry Sparkman, Z. G. Sparkman, Hugh Sparkman, Wesley Sparkman, and Alma Sparkman. Farmer in Crittenden County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, West half, p. 28; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, Precinct 2, p. 28; Find A Grave, "Hugh M. Sparkman (1822-1905)," Memorial #15166921, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=15166921 (accessed June 18, 2017).
